scripts.dev:local: npm run env:local-setup && cp .env.local.dev .env.local && next dev
scripts.env:setup: cp .env.local.dev.template .env.local.dev && cp .env.local.prod.template .env.local.prod && echo 'Environment templates created. Run npm run env:local-setup to configure local development, or edit .env.local.prod with your production values.'
scripts.env:local-setup: echo 'Setting up local environment from Supabase...' && supabase start > /tmp/supabase_start.log 2>&1 && echo '# Local Supabase development environment' > .env.local.dev && echo 'NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:54321' >> .env.local.dev && supabase status | grep 'Publishable key:' | sed 's/.*Publishable key: /NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY=/' >> .env.local.dev && supabase status | grep 'Secret key:' | sed 's/.*Secret key: /SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY=/' >> .env.local.dev && echo 'Local environment configured!'
